DOC.brief_summary: A retrospective cohort study conduct 66 end-stage renal disease patient underwent high-efficiency hemodiafiltration technique King Chulalongkorn Memorial Hospital 2001-2013 determine survival rate well long-term outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Long-term Outcome End-stage Renal Disease Patients Treated With Hig-efficiency Hemodiafiltration
DOC.detailed_description: Growing evidence suggest superiority high-efficiency hemodiafiltration ( HDF ) could provide diffusion convection single therapy compare conventional hemodialysis . However , long-term , upto 10 year , outcome still limit . This retrospective cohort study conduct 66 end-stage renal disease patient underwent high-efficiency hemodiafiltration technique single-center , King Chulalongkorn Memorial Hospital , 2001-2013 determine survival rate well long-term outcome
DOC.criteria: Aged 18 year Be diagnose endstage renal disease one year Have regularly receive longterm hemodiafiltration 6 month . Patients receive hemodiafiltration le 6 month
